Infectra

*Infectra wraps her arms around Airbomber and she sits there kiss=
ing Airbomber and enjoying every second*

  ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
 From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, August 09, 200=
0 9:11 PM
  Subject: Re: The End is Still Near, and is now close...


  Air=
bomber's arms fly around Infectra and he keeps the kiss going...
    ----- =
Original Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.c=
om 
    Sent: Wednesday, August 09, 2000 6:31 PM
    Subject: Re: The End i=
s Still Near, and is now close...


    Infectra

    *Infectra smiles and =
looks into Airbomber's optics. She slides closer to him and than kisses him=
*

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrp=
g@egroups.com 
      Sent: Tuesday, August 08, 2000 8:08 PM
      Subject: =
Re: The End is Still Near, and is now close...


      t to Infectra. He lo=
oks her in the eyes and smiles...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
     From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: T=
uesday, August 08, 2000 5:22 AM
        Subject: Re: The End is Still Near,=
 and is now close...


        Airbomber sits nexInfectra/Twister/Blizzard
=


        *Infectra smiles and sits on the bed and pats it wanting Airbombe=
r to join her*

        (OOC: No one start yelling about, Bots can't have b=
abies that way, because I'm not aiming for that. Just saying this in case s=
omeone jumps to conclusions.)



        *Twister stands behind Sinesis and=
 can see he was getting angry. She just stands there hoping that someone wo=
uld please notice them*



        *Blizzard follows Sinister and stands ne=
xt to him looking around. Hoping that they would be noticed*

          ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@eg=
roups.com 
          Sent: Tuesday, August 08, 2000 5:07 AM
          Subje=
ct: The End is Still Near, and is now close...


          Deemos seen Inzo=
la wasn't going to talk to him and walked outside to confront her.

       =
   "That's it, bitch, I'm sick of you!" Deemos said.

          Inzola laug=
hed. She had been charging her cannon for days, now she knew what to use it=
 on. Deemos had alos been charging his cannon for days, and had the same id=
ea as Inzola.

          "You love me or hate me, which one is it?" Deemos =
said angrily. Inzola pulled the cannon up at the same time as Deemos. They =
both fired. Both of them had surprised faces as they blew each other apart,=
 their pieces scattering in front of the Maximal base...

          Gangon,=
 still out of action.

          Artist walked away from the Maximal base. =
He could tell that Plintissa missed Iron Raptor, she was her only friend, a=
fter all. Dracona's words hurt Plintissa more than you could think.

      =
    Land Mine, BLEEDING TO DEATH!

          Time Bomb, LOOKING FOR LAND MI=
NE!

          Stranato sits around all day in his new room, playing Monopo=
ly with himself.

          "I landed on my Citadel! I pay myself 2000 doll=
ars!" Stranato said, taking money from the bank and laughing.

          Ai=
rbomber looked at Infectra, in their room they were in privacy.

          =
"What do you want to do?" Airbomber asked Infectra with a smile.

         =
 Sinesis got mad. He was really sick of this. He wanted someone to answer h=
im!

          "Predacon commander! I wish to join!" Sinesis said angrily. =
(If Blackarachnia is in command, then please respond, JP.)

          Sinis=
ter knocked on the Maximal bases door...

          Etchingar sighed and wa=
lked inside of the base. He started looking under everything for loose chan=
ge.

          A stasis pod falls out in the middle of nowhere, and please =
make the scanners pick it up, PLEASE!!!...
